posts.post_title: big $ reduction - T200 Boston Nationals - highest graded SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
********
edit: sale over
********

with all of the remaining T200s from my set either sold / on hold / or on eBay - 
I thought I would start this new post.

If anyone is interested in the highest graded T200 Boston Nationals -
which is the toughest card in the set -

I have a $4K value on it.

I would consider trade offers on it.

I like Honus, Matty, Cobb, and Walter Johnson cards -
I am partial to portrait cards, e-cards, cracker jacks.

I would enjoy discussing any trade for a card of similar value.

Its a great hobby!

edit to change my email address to joe@internetville.com (seems to be working now) 

[IMG]http://www.internetville.com/images/albums/userpics/10001/T200bostonNat.jpg[/IMG]
